You can customize this Slider What you just saw is the welcome slider, you can disable this in source code if you don\'t want or you can customize this with your info!. This will show only once
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data Play Again This is the about page, you can add your own text or other items here by going to activity_about.xml in \'layout\' folder. You can also disable this page in source code fcm_default_channel Thanks for your feedback! Profile Store Hide toolbar
